title: Inactivity Notifications
body:
I don't play ranked a lot and i get inactivity notifications. Before the 10 days are up i play a few games so i don't drop in LP or divisions, but even after playing the notification continues to appear. This has been happening for the past 3 months always around the same time.
https://i.imgur.com/Pe2AfKS.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/bMuDtjE.png
https://i.imgur.com/rTWpvdP.jpg
Should i be worried?

replies.body: It looks like you're ranked in Solo, Flex SR and Flex TT as well. Make sure you're playing matches in Flex SR as well so you don't start decaying in that rank.
